The CEO of Unequal Technology addressed the reasoning behind choosing Michael Vick as the company's spokesman despite his checkered past. '' Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person.'' The crimes he committed were of unspeakably terrible, but given a second-chance, Michael Vick has made the most of his opportunity.
